column4: so how many people do you get in here asking about why the install didn't ask them for a root password?
It certainly through me at first!
i was surpised, this is the first time i've tried ubuntu, thought i had missed a step :)

Yeh - I think Macs might do the same trick - I don't think it is a bad idea really; the only gotcha would be on a networked system where everyone has remote directories; I guess then you would just create a local user anyway that would happen not to be called root
